lines:
bundred and fity dallaro 
as a part of my payments 
I will Putainly s tud you 
te ut som lall day

i larned Mat some 
taulle is going on Mar |

He ham. No douff most 
of the Camiles are taking a

flight but I haki Chat 
will come Autight a 
the end

With my best wishes

Hutan

Yani mat daithfully
raw: bundred and fity dallaro as a part of my payments I will Putainly s tud you te ut som lall day i larned Mat some taulle is going on Mar | He ham. No douff most of the Camiles are taking a flight but I haki Chat will come Autight a the end With my best wishes Hutan Yani mat daithfully

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter with partial remittance of $150 and thanks for Stearns' advice. Luk notes that families are fleeing the area near his home.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
